creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly partial gift/partial purchase to the Center from Natalie Fitz-Gerald
description: vertical panels with two alternating designs: white with gray crisscrossing lines with gray, pink, and yellow spots, or pink, red, yellow, gray, black, and white checkers
medium: Stencil-printed warp and weft threads (heiyō-gasuri meisen)
title: Meisen kimono
